comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - deploy report viewer, v20060201
   - preview attached report design

expected behavior:

   - report is properly rendered

actual behavior:

   - error found, refer to following, note that it did not happen with report viewer using earlier source, i.e. v20070131

data.engine.ColumnBindingReferToInexistColumn ( 1 time(s) )
detail : org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: Column binding "CUSTOMERNAME" has referred to a data set column "CUSTOMERNAME" which is not exist. at these four report designs have similar errors

The fixing to bug 170293 enforce the expression validation of query so that invalid column bindings which refer to a column that is not exist will result with an exception. The attached report designs are actually invalid, though the early version of BIRT has not correctly report errors.

traces.message: Column binding "CUSTOMERNAME" has referred to a data set column "CUSTOMERNAME" which is not exist.
